name: SlimeTrials
description:
In this Clean-em-Up, you play as Jelysa, a slime girl working as an impromptu cleaning lady at Amoeba Labs, an esteemed Robotics and A.I. Laboratory. 

Hop over, puddle under, or just pummel robotic rejects as you fight to take back the disheveled and dingy lower levels from the mechanized clutches of entropy. 

Collect various pieces of litter and debris while you engage in the timeless battle that is tidying up to earn some quick bucks.

Remember, all is fair in love and work!
